forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun prepares to sink beneath the horizon, a gentle veil of clouds casts a soft shadow over Downtown San Francisco. Tonight unfolds under a mostly cloudy sky, with temperatures settling around 54 degrees. A brisk west-southwest wind whispers through the streets, stirring the hair of passersby as it gusts momentarily with a lively pulse. While the atmosphere doesn’t seem particularly foreboding, a misty chill lingers, hinting at the faint presence of a marine layer that often weaves its way through the city's evenings.

Looking ahead to tomorrow, dawn will bring forth a smile in the form of mostly sunny skies, the warmth of the sun breaking through to lift the spirits and temperatures. With highs nearing 66 degrees—the coolness of the morning easing into a comfortable afternoon—it's an ideal day for light layers. A light jacket or a cozy sweater becomes your ally against the winds that will once again dance through the streets later in the day. With the promise of clearer skies, a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or a quiet afternoon in one of the city's cozy cafés might be in order—perfect reminders to appreciate the city's allure while embracing the chill of the evening.
